hackathon-description-text: This 24-hour hackathon will be held prior to the

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Bitcoin Core Developer and Co-founder, Bloq

hackathon-eligibility: We believe technology should be built by people with different backgrounds and perspectives. All are welcome and we’d love to have a diverse, comfortable creative environment for everyone! Any attendees under the age of 18 will need written permission from a parent or guardian to attend.
hackathon-requirements: The judges will award the first place prize to the team that builds the best application of blockchain technology. All submissions must be posted on Devpost.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The grand prize is $10,000 USD paid in bitcoin to the winning team.
This best-in-class award presented by Gem will be given to the team with the best solution for interoperability and shared infrastructure. The prize is $5,000 USD paid in bitcoin to the winning team
The runner-up prize is $5,000 USD paid in bitcoin to the winning team.
This prize of $2,000 USD is presented by Tierion and will be awarded for the team that builds the best application using the Tierion API.

This award is presented by BitFiniti and includes a travel stipend, hotel accommodations, admission and a presentation slot at the BitFiniti conference in Miami, FL on Oct. 30 - Nov. 2. Travel and arrangements will be coordinated by BitFiniti.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=41 Peabody St, Nashville, TN 37210, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: What problem is addressed or opportunity uncovered?
Is the opportunity space or problem being solved leveraging the unique qualities of blockchain technology?

hackathon-description-header: Use blockchain technology to create the apps that will power the future of healthcare, insurance, finance and identity.
